CustomField.description: The checkbox that indicates if this Job can be canceled.
CustomField.formula:
OR (
JobCancelOverride__c == true,
AND(
AND(LOWER(ProjectStatus__c) != 'planning', LOWER(ProjectStatus__c) != 'closed', LOWER(ProjectStatus__c) != 'pending'), LOWER(TEXT(JobStatus__c)) != 'canceled', LOWER(TEXT(JobStatus__c)) != 'closed',
(DATETIMEVALUE(NULLVALUE(JobScheduledDate__c, JobStartDate__c)) - NOW() - ((NULLVALUE(JobCancelLeadTime__c,0) - 5)/24)) > 0
))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Job can be canceled if Project Status = Booked, Launched or In Progress and Job is within Cancel Lead Time.
CustomField.label: Cancelable
